- [basic operation](#basic-operation)
- [default functions: abs, quotient, remainder, round](#default-functions--abs--quotient--remainder--round)

```scheme
;----------------------------------------------
; basic operation
;----------------------------------------------

; (-)
; (+)
; (*)
; (/)
; (* 4)
(+ 1 2)
(/ 1 3)
(* 1 2 3)
(/ 1 2 3 4)
(/ 1e77 1e75)
; intergert store as a list instead of number
1234567890123456789011234567890
```
